class.name: UserManager
class.description: Manages the [User]s of your application. If register_as_global is true it will register itself when entering the tree as the global instance accessible behind [UserDB]'s api. Please note that only one instance can be set as global at a time.

method.name: _create_user
method.description:
Creates a and sets up a [User] suitable to the application's and [UserManager] backend's needs. [method create_user] calls this. The [code]user[/code] parameter allows for setting up classes that inherit from [User]. This is the method where [UserModule]s that the application always expects to be present should be set up. Example: [code]func _create_user(user: User) -> User: if !user: user = InheritedUser.new()
var um : SomeUserModule = SomeUserModule.new() um.module_name = "SomeUserModule" user.add_module(um)
# Only needed if the default implementation is not called #user.set_owner_user_manager(self)
return ._create_user(user)[/code]

method.name: _get_all_users
method.description: Returns all users. [method get_all_users] calls this.

method.name: _get_user
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given id or null if it doens't exists. [method get_user] calls this.

method.name: _get_user_email
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given email or null if it doens't exists. [method get_user_email] calls this.

method.name: _get_user_name
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given user_name or null if it doens't exists. [method get_user_name] calls this.

method.name: _is_email_taken
method.description: Returns whether an email is taken or not. [method is_email_taken] calls this.

method.name: _is_username_taken
method.description: Returns whether a user name is taken or not. [method is_username_taken] calls this.

method.name: get_user
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given id or null if it doens't exists. Calls [method _get_user].

method.name: get_user_email
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given email or null if it doens't exists. Calls [method _get_user_email].

method.name: get_user_name
method.description: Returns the [User] which have the given user_name or null if it doens't exists. Calls [method _get_user_name].

method.name: is_email_taken
method.description: Returns whether an email is taken or not. Calls [method _is_email_taken].

method.name: is_username_taken
method.description: Returns whether a user name is taken or not. Calls [method _is_username_taken].
